name: Spell Spiel Mirai
description:
A spin of my previous game, Spell Spiel, turned into a Japanese learning minigame RPG-ish. Repeat the word shown on screen to cast spells! :)

How to play: press and hold Ctrl to record, release to confirm spellcast. Say the highlighted spell for extra damage, and if you nail the pronunciation just right, you'll really pack a punch!

Letter transcript of the spells: Hidama, Mizutama, Kaminari, Koori, Toofugu, WaniKani (oo => hold the O sound)

Right / Left Click, Space / Backspace, Left / Right arrows, Enter: maneuver dialog.
